DOC.brief_summary: The trial test whether Alive multi-channel delivery health behavior program positively affect weight glucose level pre-diabetics .
DOC.brief_title: Multi-Channel Automated Diet Physical Activity Intervention Pre-Diabetics
DOC.criteria: least one measurement past 2 yr fast plasma glucose 100125 mg/dl impair glucose tolerance least one measurement body mass index ( BMI ) > =27 past two year age 4079 use diabetes medication within past two year member Kaiser Permanente Northern California ( KPNC ) least 2 year live 25 mile radius KPNC Research Clinic Oakland , CA comorbidities would contraindicate gradual adoption light/moderate physical activity , recent cardiovascular event , severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , advance arthritis , poorly control hypertension
